column5: Caution: vegetation and poorly reflected surface in summer causes a surface height that it noisey, assoicated with poor signal and difficult to interpret.
there was snow, but the signal was not good.
prolly snow, but bad signal too

All data likely biased. It is thought that the sensor window is contaminated or blocked.

This plate was a single ended measurement until 6/15/22 when Sara M. discovered the unplugged wire. It is noisy and biased. The mean bias is corrected but this is a very caution-y measurement! Sara's repair coincided with a complete loss of signal. In September 2023, we discovered that the plate cable (subsurface) was severed near that plate. I do not understand this.
